body.name: CangLong Natural Wood Legs Mid Century Modern Molded Shell Lounge Plastic Arm Chair for Living, Bedroom, Kitchen, Dining, Waiting Room,2 PCs Pack- White, Set of 2, White
features: Physical Ergonomic Back and Armrest: Our chairs come with curve seats and integrated backrests and armrest to fit your hip, back and arms better in accordance with the design concept of chairs, and to effectively relieve the fatigue of sitting for a long time.

Quality PP Seat Shells and Wood Legs: Molded in one with quality PP material, the chair shells feature high impact resistance and good toughness for years to come. What supports the chair seat is natural hard beech wood done of the legs. The use of solid wood makes the whole chair more .

Premium Hardware and Non-slip Feet: The connections between seats and legs are reinforced by quality rivets, keeping the chairs firm and from wobbly. At the end of the legs, the feet are mounted with wear-resisting plastic pads to keep the chairs from sliding and scratching the carpet.

Easy Assembly and Mid-Century Style: The chairs are pre-assembled for you, and all you need to do is finish them off with screws of each. The great mid-century modern style of the chairs will enhance the decor of both home and office. They will be a great seat solution to your dining room, balcony, restaurant as well as the dessert shop.
Note : To ensure proper assembly, please follow all steps provided in the Installation manual (provided in pdf below)
body.description: CangLong Set of 2 Modern Dining Chairs with Natural Wood Legs, Mid Century Modern DSW Molded Shell Lounge Plastic Arm Chair for Living Room, Bedroom, Kitchen, Dining Room, Waiting Room, White Easily assemble Care instruction: Wipe clean using a damp cloth and a mild cleaner. Wipe dry with a clean cloth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: These are much sturdier than I anticipated. They look great in my office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good sturdy chair
reviews.reviewText: Came with a few scratches but good quality for the price. Would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth the buy!
reviews.reviewText: I got this today and it was a super easy setup. The only things I'm nervous about are sturdiness and durability. The legs seem fine, but the chair part seems rather breakable. If you want a chair that you can lean back in or push off of when standing up, this isn't the chair for you. Otherwise, it's pretty cozy and very cute!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Beware of studiness and potential defects
reviews.reviewText: We loved these when they came initially. They were easy to assemble, looked great in our room, and were reasonably comfortable (we placed cushions on the chairs.However, after sitting in them for a few weeks, a few things happened.- The screws locking the legs to the seat loosened causing the seat to flex in odd ways and cracking the plastic.- We noticed the legs will shift and flex based on how you sit in the chair; not very sturdy- If you sit on this wrong, the odds of you falling over are VERY high. Cannot recommend to households with children.Overall we tried to reach out to customer support to talk through the screws loosening and plastic cracking but got no response. It's possible we simply got a bad batch, but combined with the complete lack of customer service I cannot recommend these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Couldn't handle causal use and cracked
reviews.reviewText: After some time, the chair broke, which was disappointing, especially considering I'm not heavy.Moreover, I found the chair to be uncomfortable for extended periods. Despite its stylish design and the promise of mid-century modern comfort, it didn't meet my expectations in terms of comfort and durability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I loved it
reviews.reviewText: We used to have an original one from the middle century, but unfortunately is not with us anymore, so this “duped” is a good remembering. Easy to assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this style for room I remodeled. Chair is as pictured and is sturdy and quality is on point. Nice wood legs too. Intend to seal with Johnson paste wax.

With the price point, the chairs do the job well. The assembly is not bad but do-able. The chairs I got comes in 2 pieces within a reasonable price point.The plastic mold has a decent fit and quite wide to accommodate people at all sizes. The legs of the chair seems flimsy at first but can be fix by tightening the screws.The main sitting mold is made of plastic so it's easier to clean. The chair design has that 'modern' style to it so be aware of the interior design you are going for (if it matters). I use mine as an accent chair for living and it worked pretty well. The chairs can be use for other purposes as well like for office, dining and/or just an overall chair for outdoors or indoors.Overall, it's a good chair to have. The price is a bit on the lower end but with the right usage and indoor design, it can be flexible and nice to look at.

reviews.reviewTitle: Couldn't ask for a better chair
reviews.reviewText: These chairs are beautiful and very sturdy! They were incredibly easy to put together; four bolts each to be tightened with a provided Allen key.They are lightweight, stylish, and very comfortable!

reviews.reviewTitle: Very good! a little pricey but everywhere else took more than a month to get it.
reviews.reviewText: So I had my reservations for this one specially since I already tried one of these a long time ago and it was very uncomfortable. This one looks really good in my room, not the most comfortable to sit long periods of time. Very good piece of furniture overall.

The reviews are correct they have plenty of room and look quite nice with the two tones of wood and grey. They are not that comfy you definitely feel how hard they are. When it rains I need to lean them so water can drain from them. Overall I'll see how durable they are but they accent the table I built for outside.

These chairs are perfect for my office. They are modern looking and easy to assemble. They have a nice style to them, with the curved armrest. I don't think I would want to stand on them lol, but they are great for casual seating.
